code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";import BadgeTech from"../Components/BadgeTech";import Project from"../Data/Project";import AOS from"aos";import"aos/dist/aos.css";import{useParams,Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Projects=()=>{useEffect(()=>{AOS.init({duration:1000});},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"h-auto mb-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-center text-6xl text-choco font-extrabold",children:"My Personal Website"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"px-28 mt-10",children:Project.map(data=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"scroll-element flex flex-col lg:flex-row justify-center lg:gap-32 my-14 items-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{"data-aos":"fade-right",className:"lg:w-[30rem] w-80 h-64 border-2 border-choco rounded-md bg-brown",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:data.image[0].img,className:"h-full w-full object-fill",alt:""})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{"data-aos":"fade-left",className:"bg-white lg:w-[30rem] w-80 p-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/project/".concat(data.slug),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-4xl font-bold",children:data.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-gray py-3",children:data.description}),data.tech.map((sub,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BadgeTech,{sub:sub},index))]})]}))})]});};export default Projects;
